panels.description: Current number of items in memory
panels.title: Current Items by bucket

panels.description: A low value means that the bucket needs more memory
panels.title: Memory headroom by bucket

panels.description: Number of items on memory over number of items on disk
panels.title: Resident item ratio by bucket

panels.description: Number of items sent through XDCR
panels.title: XDCR items sent by bucket

panels.description: Ratio of disk fetch instead of memory. If not zero, should be investigated
panels.title: Cache miss ratio by bucket

panels.description: Number of object ejections from memory. Should be zero
panels.title: Ejections by bucket

panels.description: Number of unrecoverable out of memory errors due to memory exhaustion
panels.title: OOM errors by bucket
